title: Asthma prevalence in Great Britain 2015 , by region
summary: The Asthma prevalence Great in the Britain 2015 was Great London , who made 778290 individuals .
The most prevalence Great was Scotland , with just 261352 individuals .

In second place was Great South_East with 687892 individuals ; third place went to Great North_West with 778290 individuals ; fourth place went to Great North_East with 261352 individuals and fifth place went to Great East_of_England , who was 564416 individuals .
gold: This statistic displays the number of individuals with asthma in Great Britain in 2015 . The prevalence of asthma was highest in the North West of England with over 778 thousand individuals having the condition . This was followed by individuals in the South East with approximately 687.9 thousand individuals having asthma .
